body:
$!
There are deadlines for sending your Self Assessment tax return to HM Revenue & Customs and paying any tax you owe. 
$!

For the 2011 to 2012 tax year (which ended 5 April 2012) your main deadlines are:

+ paper tax returns - by midnight 31 October 2012
+ online tax returns - by midnight 31 January 2013
+ final payment of any tax due - by midnight 31 January 2013

There are [some exceptions](/self-assessment-tax-returns/deadlines "Exceptions to deadlines") to these deadlines. 

^ If your tax return or payment is late you must pay a [penalty](/self-assessment-tax-returns/penalties "Penalties"). ^
overview: Self Assessment tax return deadlines - deadlines for your tax return and paying your tax
title: Self Assessment tax return deadlines 2011 to 2012
